summary: Adds a new set of robes and staff to the game.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a new set of robes and staff to the world of Skyrim.

The robes (unenchanted) can be crafted if you have Elven smithing at the forge under misc sectionÂ and supports both male and female.

Also, you can find an enchanted version, plus staff on three npc's that are found near the Serpent Stone.

Unfortunately, there is no beast support for the mask but I did include a hood that will work for them.

The mask and shoulder pieces are part of Natterform's Ordinator armor and added to this mod with permission. It can be found here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26720/?

Finally, due to this mod using assets from a mod that is a Nexus exclusive, this mod must remain a nexus exclusive release.

Credits

Bethesda for Skyrim
Natterforme for his awesome Ordinator armor
Blender 2.49b
NifSkope
PS CS6

Thanx, Scroll Thief
author: Scroll Thief
